name: VHSoverdose
description: VHSoverdose is an unrelenting assault of outlandish action, served up with thick juicy slice of anatomical annihilation! Set inside of the confides of a simple 80's Arcade Machine... Or is it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be DirectX 9-compatible. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
